title: Extempore (1-Minute Topics)
welcome: Welcome! Let's practice quick thinking with short speeches.
instruction: Speak clearly and express your thoughts on each topic.

fields.prompt: Speak for one minute on: 'The Importance of Reading Books'
fields.hint: Reading books opens our minds. It helps us learn about different cultures, ideas, and perspectives. Books also improve our vocabulary and imagination.

fields.prompt: Speak for one minute on: 'The Benefits of Teamwork'
fields.hint: Teamwork teaches us how to listen, share ideas, and work together. It makes tasks easier and faster. I enjoy team projects because I learn from my teammates.

validation_logic.feedback_pass: Well done! You shared your ideas confidently.
